title: Smart Data Models - ExcAVR4
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian excitation system. It represents static exciter and electric voltage regulator.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcAVR4

imul.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR output voltage dependency selector (Imul). true = selector is connected false = selector is not connected. Typical Value = true. Default: False

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR gain (K).  Typical Value = 300. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kif.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter internal reactance (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 4.8. Default: 0

t1if.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter current feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 60. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1.5. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tif.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter current feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vfmn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum exciter output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

vfmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum exciter output (V).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

vrmn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

vrmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0
